history.proof: scongruence use: @plus_assoc, prod_plus_comm, @plus_comm unfold: snd, AbelianGroup.sort, fst, prod_plus.

exceptions.exn: In environment U, V : AbelianGroup H : U * V Unable to unify "forall P : ?V -> Prop, locally ?M2436 P -> filtermap ?M2435 ?F P" with "(U * V)%type".

tactic: apply filterlim_ext_loc with (f0 := f) (g := fun x => x).
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable f0 (possible names are: f and g).

original: intros H. apply filterlim_locally_unique. - apply filterlim_ext_loc with (f0 := f) (g := fun x => x). + intros x. reflexivity. + auto. - apply filterlim_ext_loc with (f0 := f) (g := fun x => x). + intros x. reflexivity. + apply filterlim_const.
